statements: UPDATE dance_team_routines SET routine_name = 'Jazz Routine', formation_id = 1 WHERE routine_id = 1;

UPDATE music_playlists SET genre = 'Pop', num_songs = 20 WHERE playlist_id = 3;

UPDATE formations SET num_dancers = 10, formation_name = 'Circle Formation' WHERE formation_id = 3;
